original_text: Moreover he burnt incense in the valley of the son of Hinnom, and burnt his children in the fire, after the abominations of the heathen whom the Lord had cast out before the children of Israel.
korean_text: 또 힌놈의 아들 골짜기에서 분향하고 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람들의 가증한 일을 본받아 그의 자녀들을 불사르고

sentences.original_text: in the valley of the son of Hinnom,
and burnt his children in the fire,
after the abominations of the heathen
whom the Lord had cast out
